content: color w white white d rich orchid dark pink p soft rose pink b black black written instructions chain 14 and turn skip 1st chain row 1 13w ch1 and turn row 2 4w 5d 4w ch1 and turn row 3 3w 1d 5p 1d 3w ch1 and turn row 4 3d 7p 3d ch1 and turn row 5 3d 1p 1b 3p 1b 1p 3d ch1 and turn row 6 2w 1d 1p 1b 3p 1b 1p 1d 2w ch1 and turn row 7 4d 5p 4d ch1 and turn row 8 2d 1w 7d 1w 2d ch1 and turn row 9 2w 2d 5w 2d 2w ch1 and turn row 10 2w 2d 5w 2d 2w ch1 and turn row 11 13w border 3sc in last stitch of row 11 rotate tapestry clockwise and single_crochet in the sides of all the row continue around putting 3sc in each of the corners when you have crocheted the border all around fasten_off and weave in ends embroider a smile on the face using black yarn if you don t want to make a wall hanging stop here and don t continue to adding a dowel dowel attach white yarn to the top right corner of the tapestry place this loop on the dowel skip 1 stitch then use the crochet hook to pick up a loop in the next stitch place this new loop on the dowel continue skipping a stitch picking up a loop and placing the loop on the dowel when a loop has been pulled through the very last stitch make a long chain and slip_stitch to other end of the dowel this creates a chain for the wall hanging to actually hang from make it any length you want fasten_off and weave in ends the back of the tapestry will be mostly neat if you crocheted over the floats if you cut the yarn after each color or didn t crochet over your floats the backside will not be as neat and there may be more ends to weave in that s it enjoy your new mini axolotl tapestry you can make so much more than just a tiny wall decoration you could make a lot to sew together like granny squares turn it into a keychain or even use as cute coasters mini axolotl tapestry craftyalinag page 5 thank you thank you for making this project my ravelry profile is craftyalinag if you have any questions about this pattern message me there mini axolotl tapestry craftyalinag page 6
